section.title: Header
section.para: Each program file begins with a header as follows:

listitem.para: A short description of the file
License URL: a place in the Internet where find the license writing
Authors: people who have modified the file, one each line beginning in the next one
Created: creation date in japanese format YYYY MM DD, followed by the creator of the file
Description: a description of what the file is for
